title: As The Rain Falls Through Lily's Eyes
description: Welcome and meet a small town girl named Lily Anderson. She is 17 and thinks her junior year will be hard. She has no idea travel through a crazy journey through GreySon Virginia. Meet new faces and learn the secrets of the Floral Covenant.Get to know the gang Lily, Maggie and Rose and learn as they do that they are not so average after all. Meet their sexy boyfriends and enjoy the life here on earth before you get lost on planet Luna.
author: Pamela Moore Scott
